local_intent: Detect and verify the T block, align with tight tolerance, set yaw=90°, push it 0.2m at 90°, then retreat and settle.
assumptions: Block is within reachable workspace and table is clear.
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan: detect -> verify visibility -> approach/align (0.005 tol) -> set yaw 90 -> single straight push (0.2 at 90) -> retreat 0.1 -> brief wait. Uses identical bins and actions.
